actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint Resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to authorize Congress, by three-fourths vote of both Houses, to override decisions of the Supreme Court.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the Congress shall have the power, by a three-fourths vote of each House of the Congress, to override any decision of the Supreme Court of the United States.

titles.title: Joint Resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to authorize Congress, by three-fourths vote of both Houses, to override decisions of the Supreme Court.
